definition: seat of government/government repository (archive)/official residence/mansion/presidential palace/(honorific) Your home/prefecture (from Tang to Qing times)

sentences.english: Longsleeved poplin shirt with a chest pocket.
sentences.chinese: 長袖府綢襯衫，左胸一個口袋。

sentences.english: Each piece of Dyed Poplin bears face plait stamping and is wrapped in cellophane with a paper hand at each end.
sentences.chinese: 染色府綢每匹蓋有梢印外包玻璃紙，兩端各系有紙帶。
